text: Nangni ning-inchun suomma bubak nakhan inmani ngaikha injak omlekleiya injuobak-ah bubakna kha akachok inminchang. Inmani sikbit in-ngaidon. Inmani ngaikha thiraang khan wuongpuinarei iwuongpui halli ruochu karuoimak ziingkhum ka-ang kha in-eii. Akara pha-ah kakaramak, arajung inphukjei, acharra akathijei thingkuung ka-ang kha in-eii
